Key Match Events: Aaron Judge homered in the first inning, driving in the first run of the game.
Anthony Rizzo homered in the third inning, extending the Yankees' lead to 5-0.
The Dodgers scored five runs in the top of the fifth inning, tying the game at 5-5.
The Dodgers scored two more runs in the top of the eighth inning, taking a 7-5 lead.
The Yankees scored one run in the bottom of the eighth inning, making the score 7-6 in favor of the Dodgers.
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Judge expressed his disappointment in the team's loss, stating that they let a winnable game slip away.
